block.refinedstorage.security_manager.he: 该设备激活时，将默认保护网络并阻止所有操作。通过添加安全卡，可允许或拒绝玩家执行特定操作。
gui.refinedstorage.controller.redstone_m: 当此设备未激活时，存储网络将无法使用此设备作为能源来源。
gui.refinedstorage.storage.redstone_mode: 当此设备未激活时，存储网络将无法访问其中的存储内容。
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_help: 该资源能否存储取决于该设备处于白名单还是黑名单模式。
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_mode.e: 未设定任何过滤器，无法存储任何资源。
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_mode.a: 只能存储白名单内的资源。
gui.refinedstorage.storage.filter_mode.b: 能存储黑名单外的资源。
gui.refinedstorage.grid.pattern_in_inven: 物品栏中有该资源的样板。
gui.refinedstorage.grid.search_help.mod_: 输入‘@’按特定模组检索资源
gui.refinedstorage.grid.search_help.tag_: 输入‘$’按特定标签检索资源
gui.refinedstorage.grid.search_help.tool: 输入‘#’按特定提示框文本检索资源
gui.refinedstorage.crafting_grid.press_s: 按住SHIFT+CTRL仅显示配方中所需物品。
gui.refinedstorage.pattern_grid.fuzzy_mo: 匹配样板输入后使用替代品。
gui.refinedstorage.pattern_grid.processi: 该资源将从存储网络中提取并输入目标库存中。
该资源返回存储网络后视作自动合成成功。
点击以配置数量和替代品
gui.refinedstorage.detector.mode.under: 低于设定数量时发出红石信号
gui.refinedstorage.detector.mode.equal: 等于设定数量时发出红石信号
gui.refinedstorage.detector.mode.above: 大于设定数量时发出红石信号
gui.refinedstorage.detector.filter_help: 存储网络中的被检测资源。
gui.refinedstorage.destructor.filter_hel: 该方块是否会被破坏取决于该设备处于白名单还是黑名单模式。
gui.refinedstorage.destructor.filter_mod: 只能向存储网络中存储白名单内的方块。
能向存储网络中存储黑名单外的方块。
gui.refinedstorage.constructor.drop_item: 扔出物品而非放置方块
gui.refinedstorage.constructor.filter_he: 存储网络中的被放置资源。
gui.refinedstorage.interface.filter_help: 从存储网络中输出的资源。
gui.refinedstorage.exporter.filter_help: 从存储网络中输出的资源。
gui.refinedstorage.importer.filter_help: 输入到目标库存的资源。
只能向存储网络中输入白名单内的资源。
能向存储网络中输入黑名单外的资源。
该设备将始终工作，无视红石信号。
gui.refinedstorage.redstone_mode.high.he: 该设备仅在高红石信号时工作。
gui.refinedstorage.redstone_mode.low.hel: 该设备仅在无红石信号时工作。
gui.refinedstorage.scheduling_mode.defau: 使用第一个可用过滤器。
gui.refinedstorage.scheduling_mode.round: 轮询调度每个可用过滤器。
gui.refinedstorage.priority.storage_help: 存储网络输入或输出资源的顺序，优先级大者优先。点击以配置输出/输出优先级。按住CTRL点击以配置输入优先级；按住ALT点击以配置输出优先级。
gui.refinedstorage.priority.autocrafter_: 如果某个资源存在多个样板，自动合成任务将优先使用所在自动合成仓优先级更高的样板。
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.on.storage: 匹配白名单与黑名单过滤器，忽略组件。
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.on.extract: 从存储网络中提取时匹配过滤器，忽略组件。
从存储网络中提取资源时匹配过滤器，忽略组件。
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.off.storag: 精准匹配白名单与黑名单过滤器。
gui.refinedstorage.fuzzy_mode.off.extrac: 从存储网络中提取时精准匹配过滤器
存储网络中提取资源时精准匹配过滤器
gui.refinedstorage.access_mode.insert_ex: 存储网络能够输入或输出。
gui.refinedstorage.access_mode.insert.he: 存储网络只能输入。其中的资源在终端在终端可视。
gui.refinedstorage.void_excess.help: 当销毁过量模式开启且存储已满时，仍会继续接收物品但会销毁过量。
gui.refinedstorage.void_excess.allowlist: 销毁过滤仅在白名单模式可用。
gui.refinedstorage.security_manager.reds: 该设备未激活时，网络不会受到保护。
gui.refinedstorage.security_manager.no_f: 向槽位中添加一张备用安全卡，对每个没有安全卡的玩家设定权限。默认禁止所有行为。
gui.refinedstorage.relay.filter_help: Resources and patterns which should be exposed from the input network to the output network if the Relay isn't in pass-through mode.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_through.he: Whether this device should pass-through the entire input network signal as-is. Turn this off to selectively expose components to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_energy.hel: Whether this device should pass the energy buffer from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_storage.he: Whether this device should pass the storage from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_security.h: Whether this device should pass the security settings from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.pass_autocrafti: Whether this device should pass the autocrafting patterns from the input network to the output network.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.filter_mode.all: Only expose resources from the input network to the output network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.relay.filter_mode.blo: Don't expose resources from the input network to the output network that are configured in the filters.
gui.refinedstorage.disk_interface.filter: Only allow resources into the storage disks or into the network that are configured in the filters.
Disallow resources into the storage disks or into the network that are configured in the filters.
The resources that may or may not be transferred from or into the provided storage disks, depending if the device is in allowlist or blocklist mode.
gui.refinedstorage.disk_interface.transf: Insert the resources from the storage disks into the storage network.
Insert the resources from the storage network into the storage disks.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.lock_mode: Lock until redstone pulse is received
Lock until connected machine is empty
Lock until all outputs are received
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.visible_t: If this is enabled, you will be able to manage this autocrafter in the Autocrafter Manager.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.chained.h: This autocrafter is part of a chain.
This autocrafter is the head of the chain.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter.not_chain: If another autocrafter is facing this one, they'll form a chain, allowing you to have more patterns going into a single machine.
Fills in the maximum number of this resource you can craft right now without starting the crafting process yet.
Break the cycle and try again.
The request is too large to handle!
Send a notification when the autocrafting task is finished.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter_manager.s: Search in pattern inputs, pattern outputs and autocrafter names.
gui.refinedstorage.autocrafter_manager.v: Show all autocrafters that are visible to the Autocrafter Manager.
Show all autocrafters that are not full yet.
item.refinedstorage.controller.help: 为存储网络供能。可以在一个存储网络中放置多个。
item.refinedstorage.disk_drive.help: 放置存储磁盘，为存储网络提供更多存储空间。
item.refinedstorage.disk_interface.help: 在存储网络和存储磁盘之间转移资源。
item.refinedstorage.crafting_grid.help: 能与存储网络交互，还有合成功能。
item.refinedstorage.pattern_grid.help: 能制作自动合成时所需的样板。
item.refinedstorage.importer.help: 从外部存储向存储网络中输入资源。
item.refinedstorage.exporter.help: 从存储网络中向外部存储输出资源。
item.refinedstorage.interface.help: 输入器和输出器的融合体。
item.refinedstorage.external_storage.hel: 将外部存储接入存储网络。
item.refinedstorage.detector.help: 如果存储网络具有等量、超出、小于设定值的物品时，发出红石信号。
item.refinedstorage.constructor.help: 从存储网络中向世界中放置方块。
item.refinedstorage.destructor.help: Destroys blocks from the world and puts them in the storage network.
item.refinedstorage.relay.help: Turn entire sections of a storage network on or off and create new branches of your network.
item.refinedstorage.storage_disk.help: 可存储%s物品。清空后，手持右键可返还存储组件和存储外壳。与存储组件组合，可升级至更高等级。
item.refinedstorage.storage_block.help: 可存储%s物品。清空后，手持右键可返还存储组件和机器外壳。与存储组件组合，可升级至更高等级。
item.refinedstorage.fluid_storage_disk.h: 可存储%s桶。清空后，手持右键可返还流体存储组件和存储外壳。与流体存储组件组合，可升级至更高等级。
可存储%s桶。清空后，手持右键可返还流体存储组件和机械外壳。与流体存储组件组合，可升级至更高等级。
item.refinedstorage.wrench.help: 可选择方块，或按住Shift拆掉精致存储的方块。
item.refinedstorage.speed_upgrade.help: 增加存储网络设备的运行速度。
item.refinedstorage.stack_upgrade.help: 增加存储网络设备每次处理资源的数量。
item.refinedstorage.silk_touch_upgrade.h: 与镐上的精准采集魔咒相似。
item.refinedstorage.fortune_upgrade.help: 破坏方块时获得更多资源。与镐上的时运魔咒相似。
item.refinedstorage.regulator_upgrade.he: 在输出器中，只有当目标内的数量小于升级内设定的数量时才会输出；在输入器中，只有当目标内的数量大于升级内设定的数量时才会输入。使用物品以配置。
item.refinedstorage.range_upgrade.help: 增加无线发送器的发送范围。
item.refinedstorage.creative_range_upgra: 无线发送器的发送范围变为无限。但无法跨维度工作。
item.refinedstorage.autocrafting_upgrade: 缺失资源时开始自动合成任务。
item.refinedstorage.wireless_transmitter: 能让无线终端等物品无线连接网络。可在区域内使用多个扩大覆盖范围。
item.refinedstorage.network_item.unbound: 对任何存储网络设备即可绑定。
item.refinedstorage.configuration_card.c: 无法对不同设备使用配置卡。这是%s的配置。
item.refinedstorage.configuration_card.e: 潜行对存储网络设备使用配置卡即可复制其配置和升级。
item.refinedstorage.configuration_card.c: 潜行对目标存储网络设备使用即可粘贴配置和升级。潜行使用以清除配置。
item.refinedstorage.network_card.unbound: 潜行对网络接收器使用。
item.refinedstorage.network_card.bound_h: 插入网络发送器。潜行使用以清除配置。
无线发送网络信号。需要通过网络卡与网络接收器配对。
item.refinedstorage.network_receiver.hel: 无线接收网络信号。需要将网络卡绑定至该方块。
item.refinedstorage.cable.help: 将各个设备连接起来。对于完整方块，线缆能够连接任何颜色；对于线缆型方块，只会连接相同颜色或默认颜色（灰色）方块。
item.refinedstorage.security_card.unboun: 右击配置并绑定至当前玩家。
右击以配置。潜行时使用清除配置和绑定信息。
item.refinedstorage.fallback_security_ca: 当未找到与玩家匹配的安全卡时，作为备用安全卡。右击以配置。潜行使用以清除配置。
item.refinedstorage.portable_grid.help: 未与存储网络连接时，能够与存储磁盘交互。可以在世界中作为方块摆放，也能在物品栏中使用。
item.refinedstorage.storage_monitor.help: 一个显示存储网络中当前物品数量的方块。SHIFT点击以配置。左击取出一组，SHIFT左击取出一个资源，右击放入资源，多次右击批量放入。
item.refinedstorage.pattern.help: 可在自动合成中存储合成配方。潜行使用以清除配方。
能够在一个界面内管理所有的自动合成器。
item.refinedstorage.autocrafting_monitor: 显示存储网络中的自动合成任务状态，还能取消自动合成任务。
item.refinedstorage.creative_wireless_au: 创造无线自动合成监控器
key.refinedstorage.clear_crafting_grid_m: 清空合成终端矩阵内容至网络。
清空合成终端矩阵内容至物品栏。
key.refinedstorage.open_wireless_autocra: 打开无线自动合成监控器
permission.refinedstorage.insert.descrip: 玩家是否可以向网络中输入资源。
permission.refinedstorage.extract.descri: 玩家是否可以从网络中输出资源。
permission.refinedstorage.autocrafting.d: 玩家是否可以开始、取消或浏览自动合成任务。
permission.refinedstorage.open.descripti: 玩家是否可以打开网络设备GUI。
permission.refinedstorage.build.descript: 玩家是否可以增加或移除网络设备。
permission.refinedstorage.security.descr: 玩家是否可以更改网络安全设置。
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.title: 精致存储配置
refinedstorage.configuration.title: 精致存储配置
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.sm: Whether scrollbars should use smooth scrolling.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ma: Maximum amount of rows when screen size is stretched
The maximum amount of rows that can be displayed when the screen size is stretched.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.se: Whether the search box should be auto-selected.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.au: Whether a notification should be shown when an autocrafting task is finished.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.gr: Whether the Grid should use a large font for quantities.
Prevent sorting while SHIFT is down
Whether the Grid should avoid sorting when SHIFT is held down.
Whether the Grid should show a detailed tooltip.
Whether the search query should persist when closing and re-opening the Grid.
The energy used by the Grid.
The synchronization type of the Grid search box.
The resource type to be shown.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.cr: The energy used by the Crafting Grid.
What should happen to the crafting matrix slots when closing the Crafting Grid.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.pa: The energy used by the Pattern Grid.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.co: The energy capacity of the Controller.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ca: The energy used by the Cable.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.di: The energy used by the Disk Drive.
The energy used by the Disk Interface.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.st: Configuration for the 存储方块.
The energy used by the 1k 存储方块.
The energy used by the 4k 存储方块.
The energy used by the 16k 存储方块.
The energy used by the 64k 存储方块.
The energy used by the Creative 存储方块.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.fl: Configuration for the Fluid 存储方块s.
The energy used by the 64B Fluid 存储方块.
The energy used by the 256B Fluid 存储方块.
The energy used by the 1024B Fluid 存储方块.
The energy used by the 4096B Fluid 存储方块.
The energy used by the Creative Fluid 存储方块.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.im: The energy used by the Importer.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ex: The energy used by the Exporter.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.de: The energy used by the Detector.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.co: The energy used by the Constructor.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.de: The energy used by the Destructor.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.up: The additional energy used per Speed Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Stack Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Fortune 1 Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Fortune 2 Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Fortune 3 Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Silk Touch Upgrade.
The additional energy used per Regulator Upgrade.
The additional energy used per Range Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Creative Range Upgrade.
The additional energy used by the Autocrafting Upgrade.
The additional range provided by the Range Upgrade.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.if: The energy used by the Interface.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ex: The energy used by the External Storage.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.wi: The energy capacity of the Wireless Grid.
The energy used by the Wireless Grid to open.
The energy used by the Wireless Grid to insert resources.
The energy used by the Wireless Grid to extract resources.
The energy used by the Wireless Transmitter.
The base range of the Wireless Transmitter.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.st: The energy used by the Storage Monitor.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.ne: The energy used by the Network Receiver.
The energy used by the Network Transmitter.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.po: The energy capacity of the Portable Grid.
The energy used by the Portable Grid to open.
The energy used by the Portable Grid to insert resources.
The energy used by the Portable Grid to extract resources.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.se: The energy used by the Security Card.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.fa: Configuration for the Fallback Security Card.
The energy used by the Fallback Security Card.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.se: The energy used by the Security Manager.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.re: Output network energy usage (if not in pass through mode)
Output network energy usage (if not in pass through mode).
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.au: The energy used by the Autocrafter.
The additional energy used per pattern.
The energy used by the Autocrafter Manager.
The energy used by the Autocrafting Monitor.
text.autoconfig.refinedstorage.option.wi: Configuration for the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor.
The energy capacity of the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor.
The energy used by the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor to open.
The energy used by the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor to cancel a task.
The energy used by the Wireless Autocrafting Monitor to cancel all tasks.
advancements.refinedstorage.root.descrip: Use one or multiple Controllers in a storage network to provide your network with energy
advancements.refinedstorage.connecting.d: Use Cable to connect devices with each other, or place devices against each other
advancements.refinedstorage.drives.descr: Craft a Disk Drive to be able to store your storage disks
advancements.refinedstorage.interfacing_: Craft a Disk Interface to transfer resources between the storage network and storage disks
advancements.refinedstorage.storing_item: Craft a Storage Disk and put it in your Disk Drive
advancements.refinedstorage.viewing_your: Craft a Grid to interact with your storage
advancements.refinedstorage.upgrading_yo: Upgrade your Grid to a Crafting Grid to get crafting abilities
advancements.refinedstorage.storing_flui: Craft a Fluid Storage Disk and put it in your Disk Drive
advancements.refinedstorage.importing.de: Get resources into the storage network with an Importer
advancements.refinedstorage.exporting.de: Get resources out of the storage network with an Exporter
advancements.refinedstorage.upgrading.de: Craft an Upgrade to improve various devices
advancements.refinedstorage.interface_to: Export and import items at the same time with an Interface
advancements.refinedstorage.storing_exte: Use an External Storage to provide the network with storage from an external block like a chest
advancements.refinedstorage.detecting.de: Use redstone to check resources stored in the storage network
advancements.refinedstorage.construction: Get blocks from the storage network into the world with a Constructor
Get blocks from in the world into the storage network with a Destructor
advancements.refinedstorage.wireless.des: Access your resources wirelessly with a Wireless Grid
advancements.refinedstorage.better_than_: Craft a Storage Monitor to view, insert or extract resources in a storage network
advancements.refinedstorage.no_cables_re: Add extra components to your storage network without using cables by using a Network Transmitter, Network Receiver and Network Card
advancements.refinedstorage.portable_sto: Craft a Portable Grid to access the content of disks without requiring a storage network
advancements.refinedstorage.security.des: Secure your storage network with a Security Manager and a Security Card
advancements.refinedstorage.conditional_: Turn entire sections of a storage network on or off and create new branches of your network with a Relay
advancements.refinedstorage.autocrafting: Automate crafting with an Autocrafter by using patterns created in a Pattern Grid
advancements.refinedstorage.managing_pat: Craft an Autocrafter Manager to manage your patterns in a centralized interface
advancements.refinedstorage.monitoring.d: Check the status of your autocrafting tasks with a Autocrafting Monitor
advancements.refinedstorage.wireless_mon: Check the status of your autocrafting tasks wirelessly with a Wireless Autocrafting Monitor
advancements.refinedstorage.autocrafting: Use an Autocrafting Upgrade in an Interface, Exporter or Constructor to autocraft resources on demand
